view

Class PiecePrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.PiecePrinter

  • public class PiecePrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class adapted from SpectrangleBoardPrinter as provided on Canvas. Most methods take pieces (or strings such as RRR6) as input, and output nicely formatted ASCII art.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PiecePrinter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String printEmptyPiece()
      Returns a string for printing an "empty" piece in the printTiles method
      static java.lang.String printPiece(java.lang.Integer value, java.lang.Character verticalIn, java.lang.Character leftIn, java.lang.Character rightIn)
      Method that returns ASCII art of piece.
      static void printTiles(Client clientObject)
      Prints 4 ASCII art representations of pieces next to each other And adds numbers [1] [2] [3] [4] below it For use in choosing a piece in TerminalInputHandler

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public PiecePrinter()

    • Method Detail

      • printPiece

        public static java.lang.String printPiece(java.lang.Integer value,
                                          java.lang.Character verticalIn,
                                          java.lang.Character leftIn,
                                          java.lang.Character rightIn)
        Method that returns ASCII art of piece.
        Parameters:
        value - value of piece
        verticalIn - vertical color (Character) of piece
        leftIn - left color (Character) of piece
        rightIn - right color (Character) of piece
        Returns:
        ASCII art of piece

      • printEmptyPiece

        public static java.lang.String printEmptyPiece()
        Returns a string for printing an "empty" piece in the printTiles method
        Returns:
        a strng of 6 lines with the same amount of spaces.

      • printTiles

        public static void printTiles(Client clientObject)
        Prints 4 ASCII art representations of pieces next to each other And adds numbers [1] [2] [3] [4] below it For use in choosing a piece in TerminalInputHandler
        Parameters:
        clientObject - client that this is called from
